recommended_degree: Administrasi Pajak, Administrasi Perpajakan, Kebijakan Dan Manajemen Pajak (Sarjana)
job_description:
- Assist in daily tax administration activities.
- Support the collection, verification, and filing of tax documents (invoices, tax invoices, withholding tax slips, etc.).
- Input tax-related data into accounting or tax systems.
- Assist in preparing and submitting monthly tax reports (VAT, Income Tax, and others) under the supervision of the tax team.
- Help with tax data reconciliation against financial reports.
- Provide supporting documents during tax audits or internal/external reviews.
- Monitor updates on tax regulations relevant to the retail business and report findings to the team.
- Perform other administrative tasks related to the tax department.
